text.div:
UK Core NHS Number Verification Status

A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-NHSNumberVerificationStatus

name: UKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
title: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status
description: A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.
